list.name: Default
list.comment: Added an additional field to the date gridview item "bind", to keep track to which object in the arraylist is the date bound to. Distinguish years. Now uses event object to get events, event counts etc etc

task.summary:
добавлен запрос на Вибратор =В. код для подцвечивания выбранной даты теперь обернут в метод setSelectedBackground(View v, GridView gridview); добавлено вибрирование и звук при выборе даты (долгое нажатие) --надо протестить не сломается ли аппа при вибрирований на устройствах без "Вибратора"
исправлено - подцвечивать названия дней и пустых дней
Дни недели теперь начинаются с понедельника и заканчиваются воскресением
JSON parsing from urls, async tasks to retrieve the jsons
Dates parsed from db work yaaay
Removed debugging toasts, added fade_in animation
migration to the 3-dot indicator system, stop current date text recoloring
moved indicators to the right of date
Changed Day headers, adjusted selected dates paddings
My name for today is "the visual bug killer" (padding stuff)
Selecting a date item and first detailContainer animation issue solved (i think)
detail date now conditional, only showing on clicking a date with icons visible. Animation\interpolator FUN!
Before i fuck up the date backend
no dice, but correct equality test

Added an additional field to the date gridview item "bind", to keep track to which object in the arraylist is the date bound to. Distinguish years. Now uses event object to get events, event counts etc etc

MESSAGE.value:
добавлен запрос на Вибратор =В. код для подцвечивания выбранной даты теперь обернут в метод setSelectedBackground(View v, GridView gridview); добавлено вибрирование и звук при выборе даты (долгое нажатие) --надо протестить не сломается ли аппа при вибрирований на устройствах без "Вибратора"
исправлено - подцвечивать названия дней и пустых дней
Дни недели теперь начинаются с понедельника и заканчиваются воскресением
JSON parsing from urls, async tasks to retrieve the jsons
Dates parsed from db work yaaay
moved to public and free hosting
Removed debugging toasts, added fade_in animation
migration to the 3-dot indicator system, stop current date text recoloring
moved indicators to the right of date
Changed Day headers, adjusted selected dates paddings
My name for today is "the visual bug killer" (padding stuff)
Selecting a date item and first detailContainer animation issue solved (i think)
detail date now conditional, only showing on clicking a date with icons visible. Animation\interpolator FUN!
Before i fuck up the date backend
no dice, but correct equality test

Added an additional field to the date gridview item "bind", to keep track to which object in the arraylist is the date bound to. Distinguish years. Now uses event object to get events, event counts etc etc
